name: Allied Warpriestess
effect: b'[Class Bonus] Allied Warpriestess gets +1 power.\n[Memory 4+] On Attack: Recover 2. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion. Apply this effect only if there are four or more cards in your memory.)\n'

name: Backstep
effect: b"Target unit becomes distant. (Units stay distant until the end of their controller's turn.)\nDraw a card.
flavor_text: b'Any good demolitionist knows to take a few steps back before admiring their own handiwork.'

name: Cremation Ritual
effect: b'As an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally.\r\nDraw two cards.'
flavor_text: b"Embellished by flames, the former warrior's mighty countenance bred conviction in their compatriots.
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes Starter Decks 1 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Force Load
effect: b"Choose a fire or norm element Bullet card from your material deck with memory cost 0 and load it into target Gun weapon you control. (As a weapon is used for an attack, all of its loaded cards are put into the attacker's intent.)
flavor_text: b'Factory Recommendation: one round per shot.'

name: Healing Aura
effect: b"[Class Bonus] This card costs 1 less to activate. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)\nAt the beginning of your recollection phase, recover 1. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

name: Hypothermia
effect: b'Target rested ally gets -4 life until end of turn.'
flavor_text: b'Rest once, and you may never rise again.'

name: Imperial Recruit
effect: b"Foster (At the beginning of your recollection phase, if this ally hasn\xe2\x80\x99t been dealt damage since the end of your previous turn, it becomes fostered.) \nImperial Recruit gets +1 power as long as it's fostered.
editions: Alchemical Revolution Starter Decks 1 b'Andrew Yang'

name: Increasing Danger
effect: b'Draw a card. Each player draws a card into their memory.'
flavor_text: b'First, an ember. Then, a blaze.'
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 2 b'\xe9\x81\x93\xe6\xbc\xab'

name: Lurking Assailant
effect: b"Lurking Assailant has stealth as long as it's awake.\n[Level 1+] Lurking Assailant may retaliate against attackers while not defending.
flavor_text: b'Some assassins prove their skill with a dagger, others prove it with a glib tongue and twisted schemes.'

name: Navigate the Streets
effect: b'Glimpse 1+X, where X is the amount of domains you control. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.)\nFloating Memory'

name: Potion of Healing
effect: b"Brew \xe2\x80\x94 Two Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) \nSacrifice Healing Potion: Recover 5. (To recover, remove that many damage counters from your champion.)

name: Resolute Stand
effect: b'[Level 2+] You may activate this card without paying its reserve cost. If you do, skip your next draw phase.\nIf target unit would be dealt combat damage this turn, prevent 3 of that damage.'

name: Study the Fables
effect: b'Target player reveals six cards from their material deck. Draw a card into your memory.'
flavor_text: b"Perhaps the answer lies within Azoth's many myths.

name: Varuckan Acolyte
effect: b'On Enter: Destroy target regalia with memory cost 0. \n[Level 3+] Varuckan Acolyte gets +3 power.'
flavor_text: b'Some of the cabalistic rituals practiced among the mad cultists require material sacrifice.'

name: Windrider Vanguard
effect: b"[Class Bonus] Vigor (This unit wakes up at the beginning of your end phase. Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class.)
flavor_text: b"The stalwart vanguard of Camelot's airborne forces are chosen for their affinity for wind.
editions: Dawn of Ashes Alter Edition 1 b'Gendo'
Dawn of Ashes First Edition 1 b'Gendo'
